isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - REAR REAR AXLE DRIVE HOUSING, REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: REAR REAR AXLE DRIVE HOUSING, REPLACE
wtsproc.config: Vehicle has air brakes and air ride suspension.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Raise rear of vehicle. Support with frame stands.
Drain axle fluid on axle being serviced.
Remove both axle shafts. Catch fluid in suitable container.
Back-off brake adjustment. NOTE: Cage air chamber spring brake if applicable.
Remove both wheel assemblies using wheel dolly.
Remove both sets of brake shoes.
Remove left and right side torque rods from spring hanger and spring mount pad. NOTE: Observe shims and position.
Disconnect air lines from both air brake chambers.
Remove both spider plates with brake cam, cam support bracket and air brake chambers attached.
Remove drive shaft connecting the two rear axles.
Remove torque rod from axle housing and frame rail. NOTE: Observe shims and position.
Remove all bolts except two retaining differential carrier to axle housing.
Secure suitable jack to differential carrier.
Remove remaining bolts retaining differential carrier. Remove differential carrier from axle housing. Remove carrier from vehicle. Raise vehicle as needed.
Remove differential carrier from jack.
Secure jack to axle housing.
Remove spring u-bolts.
Remove housing from vehicle. Raise vehicle as needed.
Clean and inspect wheel bearings and necessary parts
Replace wheel seals.
Transfer replacement axle housing to jack.
Install axle housing in vehicle.
Install spring u-bolts. Torque to spec.
Remove jack from axle housing. Secure differential carrier to jack.
Apply sealant to differential carrier mating surface on axle housing.
Install differential carrier to axle housing. Torque bolts to spec.
Use jack to aid position of axle housing. Install torque rod to axle housing and frame rail. Torque bolts / nuts to spec. Remove jack.
Install drive shaft. Torque bolts to spec.
Install both spider plates with brake cam, cam support bracket and air brake chambers attached. Torque bolts / nuts to spec.
Connect both air brake chamber air lines to air chamber.
Install left and right side torque rods to spring hanger and spring mount pad.
Install both sets of brake shoes.
Install both wheel assemblies using wheel dolly. Include filling hub cavity with fluid, adjust wheel bearings and torque wheel bearing lock nut to spec.
Adjust brakes.

note.para: Remove air brake spring chamber cage bolt if applicable.

step1.para: Install both axle shafts with new gaskets. Torque nuts to spec.
Remove frame stands and lower vehicle.
Fill axle with proper fluid to the correct level.
Remove wheel chocks.
